description: Jack has gotten so ripped since the last time we saw him, “I’ve been working out a lot actually”. Cole felt a little intimidated, but quickly realized that’s exactly what he wanted. “Do you feel like you’re gonna be man-handled a little bit?” We asked knowing full well he would be. “I hope so!” Cole was excited about the idea. Jack definitely liked Cole as well. “I prefer my men to be a bit more on the petit side”, he smiled and looked at Cole. Jack worked himself a bit too hard showing off his workout routine. “Don’t use up all your energy, you’ll need some of it later.” That didn’t stop Jack from fucking Cole hard and long later on.
title: Jack & Cole: Bareback
